verses.text: \w Boast|strong="H1984"\w* not thyself of to \w morrow|strong="H4279"\w*; for thou \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w* not what a \w day|strong="H3117"\w* may bring \w forth|strong="H3205"\w*.\f + \fr 27.1 \ft to…: Heb. to morrow day\f*
Let another \w man|strong="H2114"\w* \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* thee, and not thine own \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*; a \w stranger|strong="H5237"\w*, and not thine own \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*.

A \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* \add is\add* \w heavy|strong="H3514"\w*, and the \w sand|strong="H2344"\w* \w weighty|strong="H5192"\w*; but a \w fool’s|strong="H0191"\w* \w wrath|strong="H3708"\w* \add is\add* \w heavier|strong="H3515"\w* than them \w both|strong="H8147"\w*.\f + \fr 27.3 \ft heavy: Heb. heaviness\f*

\w Wrath|strong="H2534"\w* \add is\add* \w cruel|strong="H0395"\w*, and \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* \add is\add* \w outrageous|strong="H7858"\w*; but who \add is\add* able to \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w envy|strong="H7068"\w*?\f + \fr 27.4 \ft Wrath…: Heb. Wrath is cruelty, and anger an overflowing\f*\f + \fr 27.4 \ft envy: or, jealousy?\f*
\w Open|strong="H1540"\w* \w rebuke|strong="H8433"\w* \add is\add* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* than \w secret|strong="H5641"\w* \w love|strong="H0160"\w*.

\w Faithful|strong="H0539"\w* \add are\add* the \w wounds|strong="H6482"\w* of a \w friend|strong="H0157"\w*; but the \w kisses|strong="H5390"\w* of an \w enemy|strong="H8130"\w* \add are\add* \w deceitful|strong="H6280"\w*.\f + \fr 27.6 \ft deceitful: or, earnest, or, frequent\f*

The \w full|strong="H7649"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w loatheth|strong="H0947"\w* an \w honeycomb|strong="H5317"\w*; but to the \w hungry|strong="H7457"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* every bitter \w thing|strong="H4751"\w* is \w sweet|strong="H4966"\w*.\f + \fr 27.7 \ft loatheth: Heb. treadeth under foot\f*

As a \w bird|strong="H6833"\w* that \w wandereth|strong="H5074"\w* from her \w nest|strong="H7064"\w*, so \add is\add* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that \w wandereth|strong="H5074"\w* from his \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.

\w Ointment|strong="H8081"\w* and \w perfume|strong="H7004"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*: so \add doth\add* the \w sweetness|strong="H4986"\w* of a \w man’s friend|strong="H7453"\w* by \w hearty|strong="H5315"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w*.\f + \fr 27.9 \ft by…: Heb. from the counsel of the soul\f*

Thine own \w friend|strong="H7453"\w*, and thy \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w friend|strong="H7453"\w*, \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* not; neither \w go|strong="H0935"\w* into thy \w brother’s|strong="H0251"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of thy \w calamity|strong="H0343"\w*: \add for\add* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \add is\add* a \w neighbour|strong="H7934"\w* \add that is\add* \w near|strong="H7138"\w* than a \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* far \w off|strong="H7350"\w*.

My \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, be \w wise|strong="H2449"\w*, and make my \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w glad|strong="H8055"\w*, that I may \w answer|strong="H7725"\w* him that \w reproacheth|strong="H2778"\w* me.

A \w prudent|strong="H6175"\w* \add man\add* \w foreseeth|strong="H7200"\w* the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, \add and\add* \w hideth|strong="H5641"\w* himself; \add but\add* the \w simple|strong="H6612"\w* pass \w on|strong="H5674"\w*, \add and\add* are \w punished|strong="H6064"\w*.

\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* his \w garment|strong="H0899"\w* that is \w surety|strong="H6148"\w* for a \w stranger|strong="H2114"\w*, and take a \w pledge|strong="H2254"\w* of him for a strange \w woman|strong="H5237"\w*.

He that \w blesseth|strong="H1288"\w* his \w friend|strong="H7453"\w* with a \w loud|strong="H1419"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, rising \w early|strong="H7925"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, it shall be \w counted|strong="H2803"\w* a \w curse|strong="H7045"\w* to him.

A \w continual|strong="H2956"\w* \w dropping|strong="H1812"\w* in a very \w rainy|strong="H5464"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* and a \w contentious|strong="H4079"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* are \w alike|strong="H7737"\w*.

Whosoever \w hideth|strong="H6845"\w* her \w hideth|strong="H6845"\w* the \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*, and the \w ointment|strong="H8081"\w* of his right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, \add which\add* \w bewrayeth|strong="H7121"\w* \add itself\add*.

\w Iron|strong="H1270"\w* \w sharpeneth|strong="H2300"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*; so a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w sharpeneth|strong="H2300"\w* the \w countenance|strong="H6440"\w* of his \w friend|strong="H7453"\w*.

Whoso \w keepeth|strong="H5341"\w* the fig \w tree|strong="H8384"\w* shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* thereof: so he that \w waiteth|strong="H8104"\w* on his \w master|strong="H0113"\w* shall be \w honoured|strong="H3513"\w*.
As in \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \add answereth\add* to \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, so the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w* to \w man|strong="H0120"\w*.

\w Hell|strong="H7585"\w* and \w destruction|strong="H0011"\w* are \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w full|strong="H7646"\w*; so the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w* are never \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w*.\f + \fr 27.20 \ft never: Heb. not\f*

\add As\add* the fining \w pot|strong="H4715"\w* for \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and the \w furnace|strong="H3564"\w* for \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*; so \add is\add* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H6310"\w* his \w praise|strong="H4110"\w*.

Though thou shouldest \w bray|strong="H3806"\w* a \w fool|strong="H0191"\w* in a \w mortar|strong="H4388"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w wheat|strong="H7383"\w* with a \w pestle|strong="H5940"\w*, \add yet\add* will not his \w foolishness|strong="H0200"\w* \w depart|strong="H5493"\w* from him.

Be thou \w diligent|strong="H3045"\w* to \w know|strong="H3045"\w* the \w state|strong="H6440"\w* of thy \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w*, \add and\add* \w look|strong="H7896"\w* \w well|strong="H3820"\w* to thy \w herds|strong="H5739"\w*.\f + \fr 27.23 \ft look…: Heb. set thy heart\f*

For \w riches|strong="H2633"\w* \add are\add* not for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: and doth the \w crown|strong="H5145"\w* \add endure\add* to \w every|strong="H1755"\w* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w*?\f + \fr 27.24 \ft riches: Heb. strength\f*\f + \fr 27.24 \ft to…: Heb. to generation and generation?\f*

The \w hay|strong="H2682"\w* \w appeareth|strong="H1540"\w*, and the tender \w grass|strong="H1877"\w* \w sheweth|strong="H7200"\w* itself, and \w herbs|strong="H6212"\w* of the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* are \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w*.
The \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* \add are\add* for thy \w clothing|strong="H3830"\w*, and the \w goats|strong="H6260"\w* \add are\add* the \w price|strong="H4242"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*.

And \add thou shalt have\add* \w goats’|strong="H5795"\w* \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* \w enough|strong="H1767"\w* for thy \w food|strong="H3899"\w*, for the \w food|strong="H3899"\w* of thy \w household|strong="H1004"\w*, and \add for\add* the \w maintenance|strong="H2416"\w* for thy \w maidens|strong="H5291"\w*.\f + \fr 27.27 \ft maintenance: Heb. life\f*
